welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Whitehall! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that South Whitehall has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Commuter Terminal
terminals.description: The commuter terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport is dedicated to regional flights and smaller aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and airport shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, the airport also has a separate terminal with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport handles all freight and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
